files.patch:
@@ -618,0 +618,11 @@ + *

+ * Whilst this API may be safe for loading local resources that are + * delivered with a {@code LookAndFeel} or application, and so have an + * equal level of trust with application code, using it to load from + * remote resources, particularly any which may have a lower level of + * trust, is strongly discouraged. + * The alternative mechanisms to load styles from an {@code InputStream} + * {@link load(InputStream, Class)} + * using a resource co-located with the application or by providing a + * {@code SynthStyleFactory} to {@link setStyleFactory} are preferred. + * Consequently this method is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. @@ -625,0 +636,2 @@ + * @deprecated Use {@link load(InputStream, Class)} or + * {@link setStyleFactory} instead @@ -626,0 +639,1 @@ + @Deprecated(since = "21", forRemoval = true)

@@ -73,0 +73,2 @@ +

+

@@ -97,0 +99,5 @@ +

Note: Synth's file format allows for the definition of code to be executed. + Loading any code from a remote location should be used only + with extreme caution from a trusted source over a secure connection. + It is strongly discouraged for an application or a LookAndFeel to do so. +
